markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 457 <sup>2.0</sup>

Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.
name: Humanoid
